classes.description:
Override or extend the styles applied to the component.
See [CSS API](#css) below for more details.

color.description: The color of the component. It supports those theme colors that make sense for this component.

disableAnimation.description: If `true`, the transition animation is disabled.

error.description: If `true`, the label will be displayed in an error state.

focused.description: If `true`, the input of this label is focused.

margin.description:
If `dense`, will adjust vertical spacing. This is normally obtained via context from
FormControl.

required.description: if `true`, the label will indicate that the input is required.

descriptions.root: Styles applied to the root element.
descriptions.focused: Pseudo-class applied to the root element if `focused={true}`.
descriptions.disabled: Pseudo-class applied to the root element if `disabled={true}`.
descriptions.error: Pseudo-class applied to the root element if `error={true}`.
descriptions.required: Pseudo-class applied to the root element if `required={true}`.
descriptions.asterisk: Pseudo-class applied to the asterisk element.
descriptions.formControl: Styles applied to the root element if the component is a descendant of `FormControl`.
descriptions.marginDense: Styles applied to the root element if `margin="dense"`.
descriptions.shrink: Styles applied to the `input` element if `shrink={true}`.
descriptions.animated: Styles applied to the `input` element if `disableAnimation={false}`.
descriptions.filled: Styles applied to the root element if `variant="filled"`.
descriptions.outlined: Styles applied to the root element if `variant="outlined"`.
